HeroSection.title: Unforgettable dining experiences for all occasions
HeroSection.description: We curate unforgettable dining experiences for all occasions. From small gatherings of six to grand events of 40,000 attendees - join us in redefining the art of dining, one exquisite moment at a time.

ContactForm.title: Get in touch with us
ContactForm.description: We would love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

FullName.minLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
FullName.maxLength: Name must be less than 50 characters

PhoneNumber.minLength: Phone number must be at least 10 characters
PhoneNumber.maxLength: Phone number must be less than 15 characters

Message.minLength: Message must be at least 10 characters
Message.maxLength: Message must be less than 500 characters

messageSent.title: Message has been sent!
messageSent.description:
Thank you for your message, {name}.
We will get back to you as soon as possible.

toasts.error: Something went wrong while sending the message. Please try again.

TheConcept.title: The Concept
TheConcept.subtitle: Exclusive culinary experiences and events for discerning clients who value unparalleled quality
TheConcept.what_is_the_concept_description: Our top chefs create personalized menus tailored to your tastes. Each event is hosted in handpicked venues that exude elegance and uniqueness. Every detail is meticulously planned to reflect your style and preferences. Indulge in unparalleled dining moments crafted especially for discerning clients like you.
TheConcept.description: Our top chefs create personalized menus tailored to your tastes. Each event is hosted in handpicked venues that exude elegance and uniqueness. Every detail is meticulously planned to reflect your style and preferences. Indulge in unparalleled dining moments crafted especially for discerning clients like you.

OurHistory.title: Our History
OurHistory.subtitle: The journey that shaped us
OurHistory.description: Since our inception, we have been committed to delivering excellence in everything we do. Our story is one of passion, dedication, and growth.

WhatWeDo.title: What We Do
WhatWeDo.subtitle: Innovative solutions and services
WhatWeDo.description: We specialize in offering unique, tailor-made solutions that meet the needs of our diverse clientele. Our goal is to ensure every experience exceeds expectations.

WhoWeAre.title: Who We Are
WhoWeAre.subtitle: Meet the team behind the vision
WhoWeAre.description: Our team is comprised of passionate professionals who are experts in their fields. Together, we work to bring your vision to life.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us
Contact.description: Weâ€™d love to hear from you. Reach out to us with any questions, inquiries, or feedback.

Events.title: Events
Events.subtitle: Discover our upcoming events
Events.description: Join us for exclusive events designed to inspire and engage. Stay tuned for updates on our latest happenings.

News.title: Latest News
News.subtitle: Stay informed with the latest updates
News.description: Catch up on the latest news and updates from our team. We share insights, stories, and behind-the-scenes looks at whatâ€™s going on.

Inspiration.title: Inspiration
Inspiration.subtitle: Creative sparks that drive us
Inspiration.description: Our creativity stems from a constant search for inspiration in everything we do. We push boundaries to deliver fresh and innovative experiences.

Vision.title: Our Vision
Vision.subtitle: Where we see ourselves in the future
Vision.description: We are driven by a clear vision of success. Our future is one of innovation, growth, and endless possibilities.

RosersConsulting.title: Rosers Consulting
RosersConsulting.subtitle: Expert guidance and support
RosersConsulting.description: We offer consulting services tailored to your business needs, helping you navigate complex challenges and seize new opportunities.

RosersGlobalEvents.title: Rosers Global Events
RosersGlobalEvents.subtitle: Worldwide events tailored for you
RosersGlobalEvents.description: We host events across the globe, ensuring each one is a reflection of excellence and tailored to meet the unique expectations of our clients.

RosersKitchen.title: Rosers Kitchen
RosersKitchen.subtitle: Culinary experiences like no other
RosersKitchen.description: Our kitchen is where culinary magic happens. We craft meals that delight the senses, using only the finest ingredients for discerning palates.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Learn more about who we are
About.description: We are a passionate team dedicated to offering high-quality experiences tailored to your needs. Our journey is rooted in excellence and driven by innovation.
